_sText:
RACE_BAJARAMA_4_1 MADE BY WANNAFUCK Original map for Garry's Mod by Francis115
Map info: - Huge! - 1 lap (Around 3 minutes) - Sun - Light Environment - HDR - 5 Cameras, 1 monitor with buttons - 2 Observation Towers - 4 Pits (For fun :) ) - 15 Checkpoints - 2 Ready Zones - Teleports (recommend noblock)
Changelog 4.1 - Checkpoints beeps could be heard from any point in the map, now it's fixed - Minor adjustments
Need suggestions to improve the map _ In order to play this map, you need Rally Race Mod installed in your server. If you want to play this map, you can join FRAGXL.com | Rally RaceMania - 80.172.230.146:27015
